column4: but its not pizza.  This is what you get if your pizza was bloated
column5: or perhaps if your pizza was allergic to bees and got stung
column6: or nuts and was served with sausage cooked in peanut oil.  It deserves its own name and its own category.  But please
column7: for the love of all that is good and holy in the world
column8: stop calling it pizza and stop comparing it to NY.
